title: The Symbolism of Hair
description:
Looking at the symbolism of hair in scripture and how it relates to death, to power, ornamentation and ultimately to glory.   
The subject of this video was suggested by Jacob Russell who runs the facebook group discussing The Symbolic World.  
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1989208418065298/

My links:  

Support: https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/
Subscribestart: https://www.subscribestar.com/jonatha...
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

The podcast: https://soundcloud.com/jonathan-pagea...
website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicW...
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
